about_the_game:
Grid – Music - Rhythm

To the Grid-M

Click, Hold, Slide and Swipe to the Rhythm in this unique grid bound rhythmic experience.

High variety music

Over 20 songs both original and licensed from indies, and upcoming artists to more established rhythm game composers. Play hand crafted levels and boss battles with music from hip hop to electronic music passing by trance.

For all skill levels

For beginners the easy difficulty is as accessible as it gets. 9 Squares, click the note with right timing. Slow songs, simple patterns, everything to get a grasp of the basics. And if its still too hard, there are modifiers to lessen the difficulty.
Experts at rhythm games know no bounds and neither does Grid-M. Take on up to 25 squares, on a moving and rotating grid with high BPM songs and complex patterns. And if it’s not enough, there are Modifiers to further increase the difficulty or just go wild.

The fair progression

Get compared to people of your skill level and feel your progression. Grid-M Abstracts away positions until they are pertinent (top 10). Instead you progress through the score distribution rank tiers. There’s always a small goal within reach!

Keep your scorecards

The score is everything in Rhythm game and now it is also a card. Have your highscores turn into cards that you can save and share!
